data.text: @ankur129_ Hi! Apologies if reaching us has been problematic. I have sended you a DM. Via tweets we do not handle the cases regarding of the bookings due the privacy reasons. -Anu / Finnair
@RohitKu66827245 Hi, could you kindly contact our customer service regarding this. You can find their contact information on this page: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@Christo99684090 Hi, I am really sorry for the inconvenience and congestion in our customer service! We have an international phone number as well, and some countries have their own. You can find them listed on this page: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@ManxMatti Hi, I am really sorry for the inconvenience! Please contact our customer service and they will help you. You can find their phone numbers on this page: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@nnimrodd Unfortunately, I don't know the exact date. Sometime during the near future/later this year. I know it's on the priority list of our development teams. -Ada/Finnair

@Hiney_Bottom @FinnairHelps Hei, olen pahoillani aiheutuneesta harmista! Voitte varmistaa vierekkäiset paikat varaamalla ne ennakkoon. Muuten emme valitettavasti aina voi taata samalle seurueelle lähekkäisiä paikkoja. Toivottavasti matka meni kuitenkin muuten mukavasti. Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

@TopiManner 😍
@RemziPara @engstrom_jr Hi, this will eventually be on all our routes, but first on Singapore, Dallas and New York flights. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@nnimrodd Hi, thank you for your feedback and patience - this is coming on our website. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: Pack your swimsuit and sunscreen, it’s time to start the beach holiday season! In our new destination Larnaca, you can enjoy Finikoudes Beach's impeccably clear water and fine sand near the city centre. Check out our five top picks for beach destinations: https://t.co/C6eqvc0n8s

urls.title: Use our handy and quick online services for Finnair Plus members
urls.description: Finnair offers many digital services for our Plus members, and we are even developing new online features constantly. You can for example take care of your bookings, update your personal information, or use your Finnair Plus points online. As a Finnair Plus member you have the option to handle most of your travel and membership needs online. Our fast-developing digital services mean that you need to contact our customer servic e less and less. - The most important benefit for our customers is speed. Our

data.text: We offer multiple digital services for our Finnair Plus members and develop new online features constantly. As a Finnair Plus member, you can take care of your bookings, update your personal information or use your Finnair Plus points online. Read more: https://t.co/lyUcZ3Ay4e

data.text: @ElodieMIECH Hi, a non-electric skateboard is allowed onboard our flights if it doesn't exceed our carry-on baggage allowance: https://t.co/IKD9rP5K8Q. You can bring it with you on flights from Helsinki, but it might be wise to double-check with the airport you're departing from. -Ada/Finnair

urls.title: New cabin
urls.description: Experience the new sensation of flying with Finnair. Our redesigned long-haul cabin will elevate your travel experience to a whole new level.

data.text: Learn how our experts reimagined Finnair’s travel experience in a 6-part series. Kristina reveals how people are at the core of our new service concept giving our customers more privacy and freedom of choice while simplifying processes for our cabin crew. https://t.co/6fxOnuDb6b https://t.co/AlLUU6wJZh
@Cheree593662022 Hi! Apologies for the delay. At this moment we have long queues in our customer care channels. I have answered to your DM now. -Anu / Finnair

@nord_express Hi, I am very sorry for the inconvenience, but currently, those are the only available payment options for upgrades. We are aware of the unfortunate limitation and working on fixing it. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Who do I contact if I have lost property at an airport or on board a Finnair flight?
urls.description: The item will be handed over to Suomen Löytötavarapalvelu (Lo st and Found service). Please visit their website for contact information. Please note that if the lost item is a passport, it will be given to Finnish Border Control. Tobacco products, alcohol, and other duty-free items left on the aircraft are given to Helsinki Airport Customs Passenger Control. Please contact them via phone at +358 9 6141. Please contact the local airport’s lost and found office. Depending on the item and who finds it

data.text: @ibiplob Hi, there is more information on lost and found items here: https://t.co/Qrn7aBwpg5. Please try contacting DFW airport regarding this. I hope you manage to get them back! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@fusefilmsuk Hi, I am sincerely really sorry for the inconvenience! You can find all our customer service phone numbers on this page: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Refund form
urls.description: With this form, you can request special assistance for your flight if you have a handicap or illness, or inform us about the details of your medical device.

data.text: @steveellis64 Hi, did you have a Flex ticket and have you applied for a refund here: https://t.co/hxX56HaQ3p? There is currently a delay in refund handling. We’ll inform you via email when your refund application has been processed. I apologise for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@FinnPower70 Hei! Ikävä kuulla, että asiakaspalveluumme pääsy on ollut vaikeaa. Olemme rekrynneet lisää virkailijoita ja rekryämme heitä kokoajan lisää, mutta koulutuksessa kestää useampi viikko, joten heidän apu ei heti palvelulinjoissa näy. Laitoin sinulle tulemaan yksityisviestiä /Anu

urls.title: Change your booking flexibly
urls.description: With our updated ticket policy, you can now change your travel dates with more flexibility. Book Finnair flights and travel with confidence!

data.text: Our flexible booking policy is valid until 31 May. Please note that our normal ticket rules will apply for bookings made from 1 June onwards. You can add extra flexibility with our Classic or Flex ticket types, or by purchasing Finnair Cancellation Cover. https://t.co/NQN3hfI84T

urls.title: Finnair’s new signature cocktail inspired by the sunset takes off to the skies
urls.description: From 11 May onwards, you can enjoy our brand-new signature cocktail, created together with Danish Mikropolis Cocktails. Plenty of lingonberries, a splash of gin and a dash of orange peel bring you a whole new form of enjoyment on our long-haul flights. Sit back and relax, your long-haul flight is about to take off. Maybe admire the stunning view above the clouds, perhaps the beautiful sunset glowing in the shades of red, orange and yellow. Let us introduce you our new signature drink, Northern Blush,

@zabulka Hi, your normal tier benefits apply despite the ticket type you choose. Have a lovely flight! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Facemask policy on our flights
urls.description: Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. As coronavirus pandemic is moving to a new phase and coronavirus related restrictions are being removed across countries, we at Finnair are lifting the requirement to wear a face mask on board our flights. Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. On flights where using a mask is an authority requirement,

data.text: Please note that using a face mask on our flights is optional unless required by your destination or origin authorities. Remember to check from our travel update, whether using a mask is still mandatory on your flight: https://t.co/AdJ6tww1BH https://t.co/XHvmF4Nufu

@Jeetjemineetje Hi, I am extremely sorry about the congestion in our customer service at the moment! We also have a phone number for Thailand customer service: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy in case you would like to try calling that and weren't able to reach anyone yet. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Facemask policy on our flights
urls.description: Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. As coronavirus pandemic is moving to a new phase and coronavirus related restrictions are being removed across countries, we at Finnair are lifting the requirement to wear a face mask on board our flights. data.text: @TomasKral19 Hi, face masks are still required on all our Asian flights. You can find the list of the destinations requiring masks here: https://t.co/afhCwJFHKZ. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@siddhant_arora Hi, I am really sorry for the inconvenience! If you aren't unable to change your booking yourself, could you kindly call our customer service? You can find their phone numbers listed on this page: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

In April, Finnair carried 680,300 passengers, which was 740.4% more than in April 2021. The number of passengers in April 2022 was 10.7% more than in March 2022 (month-on-month figures are not fully comparable as there was one fewer day in April). https://t.co/6MbAFr83co https://t.co/AlCvtRwmxc

@iPabbie Hi, I'm really sorry for the inconvenience and long waiting times currently in our customer service! Please try again reaching us, you can find all the phone numbers here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@HJDavies3 Hi, thank you for your lovely feedback - I'm glad our crew was able to exceed your expectations and you enjoyed your flight with us! Welcome on board soon again! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Welcome to Finnair Plus
urls.description: Finnair Plus is Finnair’s frequent flyer program. As a Finnair Plus member you can earn and use points on flights and enjoy other great benefits. Join now!

data.text: This month we’re celebrating 30 years of Finnair Plus! As a thank you of our journey together, we offer you great anniversary month benefits, such as flight offers and triple Finnair Plus points. Discover our brilliant birthday offers and learn more: https://t.co/5KtNmJMB8S https://t.co/u7r4zlYNrw

urls.title: Finnair ticket types
urls.description: Our ticket options available in Business, Premium Economy and Economy Class offer you the choice and flexibility you've been looking for.

data.text: @ItsJoeTurner Hi, we have three different ticket types to serve the different needs of our customers: Light, Classic and Flex. Our Classic and Flex ticket types include checked baggage. You can read more about our ticket types here: https://t.co/jjMJSjKZqi. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Kasvomaskien käyttö lennoillamme
urls.description: Kasvomaskin käyttö lennoillamme on vapaaehtoista, paitsi jos kohde- tai lähtömaasi viranomaiset sitä edellyttävät. Koronaviruspandemia on siirtymässä uuteen vaiheeseen ja monet maat luopuvat koronavirukseen liittyvistä rajoituksista. Tämän mukaisesti me Finnairilla luovumme kasvomaskivaatimuksesta lennoillamme. Kasvomaskin käyttö lennoillamme on vapaaehtoista, paitsi jos kohde- tai lähtömaasi viranomaiset sitä edellyttävät. Lennoilla, joilla maskin käyttäminen on viranomaisvaatimus, sinun tulee käyttää

urls.title: Flight bookings | select country and language
urls.description: Finnair flies the shortcut between Europe and Asia. Start by selecting your country and preferred language and then proceed to booking your flights.

data.text: Finnair supports Ukrainians with a 95% discount on net fares for one-way tickets from Warsaw, Krakow, Gdansk, Budapest and Prague to Helsinki. The discount is available with code Ukraine95 at https://t.co/eiciaI8FAY until 31 May. Taxes and fees will be added to ticket prices. https://t.co/piskr1IqZG

urls.title: Inspiration, information and travel extras to make your holiday planning easy
urls.description: Planning your next unforgettable holiday is easy with Finnair’s wide range of digital services. There are several services available on Finnair.com that will help you to easily plan your trip and also tailor your journey with travel extras. Still deciding on your next destination? Check out our Flight offers page to find out which destinations we currently have in our network, and what the starting from fares are. You can also search destinations by country and see, for instance, all our destinations in

data.text: Planning your summer holiday? Check the schedules for different destinations easily on our Timetables page, find out possible travel requirements from our travel requirements map and add travel extras to your reservation in Manage booking. https://t.co/13SYED6Ndu

@PirtaHotulainen Hei, voit ehdottomasti edelleen halutessasi käyttää maskia kaikilla lennoillamme. FFP2- ja FFP3-maskit antavat todistetusti erinomaisen, yli 95 % suojan, vaikka muut ympärillä eivät käyttäisi maskia. Myös lentohenkilökuntamme voi halutessaan edelleen käyttää maskia. -Ada/Finnair

@tonni Hi Tommi, thank you for your feedback on the new seats - I'm glad to hear you found them comfortable! I'm sorry for the power issues, hopefully the systems started to work afterwards and you had a nice flight despite the issues. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Finnair's carbon offset service
urls.description: Join us on our most important journey and offset your flight emissions.

data.text: Did you know that you can now calculate and offset the carbon footprint from your flights with our service that combines Sustainable Aviation Fuel (SAF) and trusted climate projects? Join our journey toward carbon neutrality and read more: https://t.co/hFMR40evx1 https://t.co/JHMx8jFQrW

urls.title: Refund form
urls.description: With this form, you can request special assistance for your flight if you have a handicap or illness, or inform us about the details of your medical device.

data.text: @wayforV @FinnairHelps Hi, have you applied for a refund on our website: https://t.co/hxX56GTfbR? Our average handling time for refunds is currently 4–5 weeks. Some requests may, unfortunately, take more time to be handled. We are sorry if we keep you waiting longer than expected. -Ada/Finnair

data.text: Summer is an amazing time to visit Lapland. Tons of outdoor activities from hikes with breathtaking views to fishing in high-quality natural fishing spots keep you busy while nature shows its unique beauty surrounded by the magical endless light: https://t.co/a9N0g1iQEt
@GustFunkel Hej, nej - du behöver inte covidbevis för att göra transfern. -Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Facemask policy on our flights
urls.description: Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. As coronavirus pandemic is moving to a new phase and coronavirus related restrictions are being removed across countries, we at Finnair are lifting the requirement to wear a face mask on board our flights. Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. On flights where using a mask is an authority requirement,

data.text: @fionnyfish @WicMar @maskupsweden @KeithMEWAS @HelsinkiAirport Hi, face masks are still mandatory on many of our routes: https://t.co/afhCwJFHKZ and you are very welcome to use one on all our flights. FFP2 masks are proven to give excellent, more than 95% protection, even if others around you are not using masks. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@ZouaghiUgo Hi, I am sorry for the inconvenience! If you can't change your flight in Manage booking, please call our customer service. You can find their phone numbers listed on this page: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@marco9787 Thank you for the nice feedback, Marc! Happy to hear you enjoyed it. Have a lovely day! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@erinkarfin Hi, you are still more than welcome to use a mask on all our flights. FFP2 and FFP3 masks are proven to give excellent, more than 95% protection, even if others around you are not using masks. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@badgersrule77 @FinnairHelps Hi, I apologise for a delayed answer. We renewed our website last autumn and don't unfortunately yet have the multicity option available. It's coming back eventually, for now, please book through our customer service or purchase separate one-way flights. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

Our Premium Economy seats customised uniquely to Finnair with lots of storage and Economy Class seats with comfortable memory foam cushions ensure you an enjoyable travel experience in all travel classes on our long-haul flights: https://t.co/S5fClr3pxo

data.text: As of today, you are no longer required to wear a facemask on Finnair flights, unless it’s required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. Please check the mask requirements of your origin and destination country before travelling: https://t.co/AdJ6twvtM9 https://t.co/NbJ24F1EUB
@vishunj Hi, so far we don't have plans to fly to Atlanta, but I can forward your wish! 💙 Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@M_Virtanen The aircraft is regarded as a low-risk environment for virus transmission thanks to the effective HEPA filters. To have additional protection, you can choose to wear an FFP2 or FFP3 mask, which offer excellent protection even if others on board are not wearing masks. -Ada/Finnair

As coronavirus related restrictions are removed across countries, we will close the Finnair coronavirus test point near Helsinki Airport on 30 May. We continue to offer our customers discounted coronavirus testing options with our partners. https://t.co/LzGZBYEgSs

data.text: The sustainability of flying is affected by not only the development made within airlines but also the decisions customers make. You can choose the most direct flight you can find, compensate for the emissions produced, pre-order a meal and pack lightly: https://t.co/s9BFyWn3HV

urls.title: Travelling to Finland
urls.description: Finland has opened for travel from the EU and Schengen countries. Travel from outside of the EU and Schengen area remains restricted. Finnish authorities define the entry requirements to Finland. See more detailed instructions below. Please also note that travel restrictions are subject to change at short notice. As a traveller, you are always responsible for ensuring that you fulfil the requirements of your destination and possible transit country. You can check the current entry restrictions to Finland

data.text: @zakkokugohaaan Hi, if you are fully vaccinated at least 7 days before entering Finland, you do not need a PCR test: https://t.co/diJSSEzRB8. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
